main event: A witness looked out the window and saw one bright circular light in the sky moving in a straight line, which disappeared in the distance.
interesting points: The object was observed for 10 minutes.
The witness thought the object could have been a satellite.
Two previous sightings in the area were corroborated.
The object appeared to make a radical change in direction.
The object was estimated to be at an altitude of approximately 3,000 feet.
location: 15 plus miles SSE of Apt. 15572, 6006 Zephyr
